channel.title: turbo-fan on sytranvn.dev
channel.description: Recent content in turbo-fan on sytranvn.dev

item.title: Turbo fan part 1
item.description: function Obj(x, y) { this.x = x this.y = y this.add = function(other) { this.x += other.x this.y += other.y } } var N = arguments[0] var obj = new Obj(1, 1) for (let x = 1, y = 1; x < N; x++, y+=2) { var other = new Obj(x, y) obj.add(other) if (obj.x > 50000) { obj.z = obj.x + obj.y } } d8 --trace-opt --trace-deopt opt.js -- 50000 // x = 1134 [marking 0x287a00253a2d <JSFunction (sfi = 0x287a00253709)> for optimized recompilation, reason: hot and stable] [compiling method 0x287a00253a2d <JSFunction (sfi = 0x287a00253709)> (target TURBOFAN) using TurboFan OSR] [optimizing 0x287a00253a2d <JSFunction (sfi = 0x287a00253709)> (target TURBOFAN) - took 0.
